arts.ttl: Liverpool midfielder is targeted by Real Betis for January move with Arne Slot previously insisting the 'very talented' star has a future at Anfield
arts.sum: SIMON JONES: Spanish side Real Betis are considering a January move for one of Liverpool's rising stars, despite Arne Slot previously hailing the academy product as a 'very talented player'.

arts.ttl: Real Betis in ‘advanced talks’ over deal for Liverpool youngster

arts.ttl: Journalist: Liverpool player could head to La Liga soon, clubs locked in talks
arts.sum: Liverpool midfielder Stefan Bajcetic could join Real Betis on loan this month. According to Fabrizio Romano, the two clubs are currently locked in advanced talks to get the deal across the line. The 20-year-old midfielder is currently on loan at Red Bull Salzburg, but he has not had ample opportunities with them. The midfielder has […] The post Journalist: Liverpool player could head to La Liga soon, clubs locked in talks appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Enzo Le Fee move to Real Betis could have Implications for Arthur
arts.sum: Enzo Le Fee's time at Roma appears to be coming to a close, with the midfielder on the brink of a transfer to Real Betis. The 24-year-old, who joined Roma from Rennes for €23 million last summer, has struggled to find his place in the squad under coach Claudio Ranieri, making only ten appearances and totalling just 460 minutes of play. The post Enzo Le Fee move to Real Betis could have Implications for Arthur appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Rodri Fires Back at Cristiano Ronaldo's Ballon d'Or Criticism
arts.sum: Rodri hit back at Cristiano Ronaldo's recent claims that Vinícius Júnior deserved to win the 2024 Ballon d'Or.
